user.description: Monitor user-based and CDC reports for a pair of coordinates.
user.title: Configure Flu Near You

confirm.description:
The external data source powering the Flu Near You integration is no longer available; thus, the integration no longer works.

Press SUBMIT to remove Flu Near You from your Home Assistant instance.
confirm.title: Remove Flu Near You

integration_removal.title: Flu Near You is no longer available
